functions.name: boolalpha
functions.description: Sets the boolalpha format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: noboolalpha
functions.description: Resets the boolalpha format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: showbase
functions.description: Sets the showbase format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: noshowbase
functions.description: Resets the showbase format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: showpoint
functions.description: Sets the showpoint format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: noshowpoint
functions.description: Resets the showpoint format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: showpos
functions.description: Sets the showpos format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: noshowpos
functions.description: Resets the showpos format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: skipws
functions.description: Sets the skipws format flag for the input stream.

functions.name: noskipws
functions.description: Resets the skipws format flag for the input stream.

functions.name: uppercase
functions.description: Sets the uppercase format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: nouppercase
functions.description: Resets the uppercase format flag for the output stream.

functions.name: resetiosflags
functions.description: Resets specific format flags of the output stream.

functions.name: setiosflags
functions.description: Sets specific format flags of the output stream.

functions.name: setbase
functions.description: Sets the numeric base of the output stream.

functions.name: setfill
functions.description: Sets the fill character for the output stream.

functions.name: setprecision
functions.description: Sets the precision of floating-point values in the output stream.

functions.name: setw
functions.description: Sets the field width of the output stream.
